summary: A custom Preset of Orion for RaceMenu
descriptionHtml:
This is Orion, one of my many presets for Skyrim.

I have a potato computer (so dont judge the screenshots too hard)



He is a hardy (yet handsome) person.


He looks good in a full suit of Steel Armor, and just as good in Leather, or a robe.


This includes a "head sculpt" of Orion, and a face preset


Requirements:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url]

[url=https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwjO4rS4ge7RAhVGLyYKHYekBSgQFggaMAA&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fmods%2F29624%2F&usg=AFQjCNGKRnNInSMVx9siVsnemDCWUpQvsg&sig2=EIJw533Qu20Wyr_fHRg74Q&bvm=bv.145822982,d.eWE]RaceMenu[/url]

Installation:

NMM:

INSTALL NORMALLY

Manual:

Copy the "skse" folder to your skyrim "data" folder


Bugs:

None that i know of so far.
author: BoneTongue
